law.catch_line: Applicability of penalties in KRS Chapter 506 to KRS 217.005 to 217.215.
law.text: Unless this chapter provides a specific penalty for the same act, the provisions of KRS Chapter 506 shall apply to offenses under KRS 217.005 to 217.215.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1998.
